text: kya tumane nahin dekha[1] ki allaah ne utaara aakaash se jal? phir pravaahit kar diye usake srot dharatee mein. phir nikaalata hai usase khetiyaan vibhinn rangon kee. phir sookh jaatee hain, to tum dekhate ho unhen peelee, phir use choor-choor kar deta hai. nishchay isamen badee shiksha hai matimaanon ke lie
